Comment.Language: From the Paramoun of the Nativity to the Feast of the Circumcision:

Text.Language: Tenouwst m~mok w~ Pi,~rictoc: nem Pekiwt n~a~gayoc: nem Pip~neuma eyouab: je aumack akcw] m~mon nai nan.
We worship You, O Christ, with Your good Father, and the Holy Spirit, for You were born and saved us. Have mercy on us.

Comment.Language: From Paramoun of the Theophany until the 12th of Tobe:

Text.Language: Tenouwst m~mok w~ Pi,~rictoc: nem Pekiwt n~a~gayoc: nem Pip~neuma eyouab: je ak[iwmc akcw] m~mon nai nan.
We worship You, O Christ, with Your good Father, and the Holy Spirit, for You were baptized and saved us. Have mercy on us.

Comment.Language: On the two Feasts of the Cross, during Holy Pascha Week, and during funerals:

Text.Language: Tenouwst m~mok w~ Pi,~rictoc: nem Pekiwt n~a~gayoc: nem Pip~neuma eyouab: je auask akcw] m~mon nai nan.
We worship You, O Christ, with Your good Father, and the Holy Spirit, for You were crucified and saved us. Have mercy on us.

Tenouwst m~mok w~ Pi,~rictoc: nem Pekiwt n~a~gayoc: nem Pip~neuma eyouab: je aktwnk akcw] m~mon nai nan.
We worship You, O Christ, with Your good Father, and the Holy Spirit, for You have risen and saved us. Have mercy on us.

Comment.Language: On standard days of the year and on fasting days:

Text.Language: Tenouwst m~mok w~ Pi,~rictoc: nem Pekiwt n~a~gayoc: nem Pip~neuma eyouab: je aki~ akcw] m~mon nai nan.
We worship You, O Christ, with Your good Father, and the Holy Spirit, for You have come and saved us. Have mercy on us.
